condition.narrative: No later than three months after the Effective Date, hire an internal auditor.
No later than three months after the Effective Date, sign an amendment of the existing contract with external auditors to includethe audit of the Project financial statements;
No later than two months after the Effective Date, customize its accounting software to maintain separate records and ledgeraccounts for the Project;
